Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
